item.title: Watched Word Wars last night. I’m amaze…
item.description: Watched Word Wars last night. I'm amazed that they have such a tolerance for drug abuse. It made me think about a point that the documentary Bigger, Faster, Stronger brought up. In order to be competitive in today's competitions, you need to be juiced up on something.
